entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, 0.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Chatham-Kent 4:59 PM EST Monday 06 March 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: 0.2°C
Pressure: 101.6 kPa
Visibility: 9.7 km
Humidity: 96 %
Dewpoint: -0.4°C
Wind: E 28 km/h gust 39 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Monday night: Flurries or rain showers. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Rain showers and flurries changing to a few flurries this evening. Risk of freezing drizzle late this evening and overnight. Local snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 2. Forecast issued 3:56 PM EST Monday 06 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Sunny. High plus 3.
